data.message: So its career day at school and my daughter wanted to be Eminem so as mother I support her here she is the first white female slim shady

replies.message: That's so cool. and thanks for supporting. I liked it.
Lol. She has a lot to learn.
She's just her and I support that
Not the first female slim shady.. I bet I could rap her so tight, the bow I deliver will be a soul killer.
She's just a kid and that's my daughter so watch it
So you gave birth as a young whore? Pretty sure under an Em comment you should expect this kind of language

Excuse me I was married for over twelve years whores don't do that and u people are redicalios grow up I was supporting my daughter and as a mother I think that's perty respectfully so grow up or be haters

She's twelve u dorks obviously your comments say alot about who are u Lord be with ya grow up attacking a twelve year old following her dreams to beat it all you're grown ass people what does that say about u

By the way bar del Mar Eminem raps about his life he tells his story from his feelings so it says alot about u as far you well we want call ur words lyrics where not trying to imitate Eminem he is just one of her favorite rapers that inspire her to be a rapper so shut ur mouth and obviously I laugh at you and feel bad for u ur the reason rappers like Eminem and others get blamed for kids doing this and that because of your B's if u ask me attacking a lil girl who dressed as him for career day sounds sad pathetic and a bit of jeoulasy added in there ur language doesn't bother me ur attitude and hatred and disrespect toward fans makes u look bad I don't think u deserve to be a fan and grow up and rap about that call me what u want but u leave my child and anyone else on this page alone that has or is inspired by Eminem or any other rapper to chase there dreams seems to me you are a bitter jeoulasy old bitty so bite me I hope one day if my daughter or anyone else does make it they'll grow up and and right a song and name after u not good enough to make it with people ur on age picking on a twelve year olds with dream haten old jeoulasy ass washed out bitty. so childish u should be ashamed we as adults and fans should inspire and encourage not discriminate and hate u make rap music look bad u really don't deserve to be a fan I hope u truly grow up and the only thing u can blow up is ur big as head u to bitty dream killer .
Don't let these comments get to you most of the people on here that comment negative shit are just worthless assholes!
I know but that my girl thank u
